sect1.title: Plugin Overview
sect1.para: All GUS Plugins inherit from the common superclass, GUS::PluginMgr::Plugin. The Plugin superclass provides important administrative functionality to all plugins, such as handling command line arguments, documentation, error handling, logging, and other functions. Except when noted, all superclass methods are instance methods (i.e. those called in the form $self->my_method_name).
The Plugin superclass requires that all plugins implement the new method. At a minimum, this method must initialize the plugin.
